ygData.subject: Re: fear plane
ygData.msgSnippet: Yeah common for now, knowing Verant they ll change this one day.  They might not but who knows.  Anymore it seems like with every patch they make another item
ygData.messageBody:
Yeah common for now, knowing Verant they'll change this one day. They might
not but who knows. Anymore it seems like with every patch they make another
item a lore or a No Drop item, they keep up with the No Drops and we won't
be able to drop, sell or trade anything.
But anyways what lvl is the Plane of Fear?

**************************
Azor
Lvl 18 Human Cleric of the Rathe
**************************

> From: Mystik <mystik@...>
>
> ahhh...i know the gorgons drop the druid armor, the worry wraiths drop the
> cleric.....not sure about the others....i think the fetid fiends drop the
> blue pally armor.....not really sure about the rest...all common mobs tho
(:
>
> Sean.Stephen@... wrote:
>
> > From: Sean.Stephen@...
> >
> > what drops such sweet armor on that nasty plane then ?
> >
> > Mystik <mystik@...> on 04/08/99 05:32:11
> >
> > Please respond to EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
> >
> > To: "EQ-Clerics@onelist.com" <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
> > cc: (bcc: Sean Stephen/UK/PSYGNOSIS)
> > Subject: [EQ-Clerics] fear plane
> >
> > From: Mystik <mystik@...>
> >
> > OMG that place is kewl!!!!! (: and the cleric only armor is nice...only
> > gotten one piece so far, and was lucky to get that....but other than
> > that, it's very fun....the armor is a deep purple...i took tons of
> > screens, and i'll send them out to you guys when i weed thru em in a day
> > or so...will get a pic of me in the armor so you can see it for
> > yourself...the stats on the bracer i got is like 9dex, 9cha, and 20
> > mana....no drop, as is all armor in there...BUT it's cleric
> > only...<sweeeeeet> don't know the stats on the bp or the sleeves, boots,
> > helm, etc, but i do know the legs add like 9 wis <drools>...anywoo, just
> > wanted to share my adventure for the night (:
> >
> > (\/)ystix Spellchaser
> > lv 46 human cleric of The Rathe
